issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Reference previous Issue: TIMOB-5488 (Unresolved) (from 1.8.2)

========================================================================
New Behavior for SDK 2.0.0.v20120325213306
------------------------------------------
Breakpoint not hit, Emulator terminates (closes)

Console:
--------
[INFO] Application started
[INFO] debug_test201/1.0 (2.0.0.v20120325213306.963fcfe)
2012-03-26 13:27:52.505 debug_test201[45294:1bb03] *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSUnknownKeyException', reason: '[<__NSCFString 0x9a67310> valueForUndefinedKey:]: this class is not key value coding-compliant for the key message.'
*** First throw call stack:
(0x2f55052 0x2d75d0a 0x2f54f11 0xa54f0e 0x9c3841 0x9c2ca9 0x393521 0x2ebb51d 0x2ebb437 0x392c5a 0x393ac0 0x394b87 0x39a19f 0x39aac1 0x39c1b6 0x2b4821 0x2b10dc 0x2b3102 0x2f6424 0x25f01f 0x45834 0x2f56ec9 0x49e52 0x4bde8 0x45a1d 0x468d9 0x2f56e72 0x4cd2d 0x9b94e6 0x9b9457 0x95198ed9 0x9519c6de)
